name: ColorJoy Minigames
description:
ColorJoy includes over 30 color-based mini games.

  ColorJoy provides you with a lot of attention, memory and speed games.

Train your reflexes and try to be the 1st place in all available charts.

The games are based on clicks, slides and are very addictive.

Play ColorJoy multiplayer and challenge your friends in tournaments!

Buy animals and items that will bring you benefits in each game, such as:

* Extra seconds

* Slow motion effect

* Automatic presses

These will help you beat the records in the charts, for each game!

Play ColorJoy multiplayer!

Features:

* Very addictive games

* Low poly graphics

* Games for children who develop certain skills and reflexes

* Psychological games that will keep you under pressure
